archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Track & Manage Resource Provisioning
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Ensure resource provisioning activities are assigned, managed and tracked efficiently

properties.value: The objective of the Track & Manage Resource Provisioning process is to ensure resource provisioning activities are assigned, managed and tracked efficiently. Responsibilities of these processes include, but are not limited to: â€¢Scheduling, assigning and coordinating resource provisioning related activities; â€¢Escalating status of resource orders in accordance with local policy; â€¢Undertaking necessary tracking of the execution process; â€¢Adding additional information to an existing resource order;â€¢ â€¢Modifying information in an existing resource order; â€¢Modifying the resource order status;â€¢ â€¢Canceling a resource order when the initiating service order is cancelled; â€¢Monitoring the jeopardy status of resource orders, and escalating resource orders as necessary â€¢Indicating completion of a resource order by modifying the resource order status. These processes will co-ordinate all the actions necessary in order to guarantee that all tasks are finished at the appropriate time and in the appropriate sequence. The Track & Manage Resource Provisioning processes are responsible for engaging external suppliers in provisioning activities when these have been outsourced or contracted to external parties. The Track & Manage Resource Provisioning processes will also inform the Close Resource Order processes by modifying the resource order status to complete when the resource order has been fulfilled.
